name: Promoted to Shadow
description:
This game was developped for the 7DRL Game Jam.

Commands :
W : Up
A : Left
S : Down
D : Right
E : Stay Still
Left Click : Select/Use an Item | Open the Map
Right Click : Unselect an Item | Close the Map

You are just a Pawn in this Company.

After weeks of asking your King for a promotion, it was time to make him do it, by fair means or foul.

Go up his building to find him, but be wary of your former colleagues. Try to find the Key in the North-East Alley and Come back to open the next Floor without getting Detected.

Every Floor, a Pawnbroker will sell you Items. Yes, with this Pawnbroker, YOU pay to get items (you are the Pawn after all). But you will have to use something way more valuable than money : Your Time.
